name: Escape! (itch) (AlfaDev)
description:
Hey, thanks for checking out my first game!

This game is a short and simple platformer where you dodge or kill the enemies to escape. It's my first game, so some features will be buggy or missing. Since it is not finished I will be adding more features and levels in the future, so please comment on what you would like to see added to the game.

I hope you have a great rest of your day!
